parameters.formDescription:
Welcome to Jim's Appointment Form.
Before we set a date, please tell me a little about yourself and how I can help.

options.formDescription:
=Terms and Conditions for Booking an Appointment

Non-Binding Nature of Discussions:
Any information shared, discussed, or agreed upon during the call is non-binding and provisional. No agreement, service, or commitment shall be considered confirmed unless explicitly documented and agreed to in writing.

Prohibition of Recording and Note-Taking Tools:
By proceeding with the appointment, the user agrees not to use AI assistants, note-taking applications, recording devices, or any other technology to record or transcribe the conversation, whether manually or automatically. This is to ensure confidentiality and respect for the integrity of the discussion.

Confirmation of Understanding:
By booking this appointment, you acknowledge and accept these terms and conditions in full.

values.option: I accept the terms and conditions

parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $('Get Form Values').first().json.name }},

Thanks for requesting an appointment. We will review and get back to you shortly.

Here is the summary of the request that was sent:

Name: {{ $('Get Form Values').first().json.name }}
Email: {{ $('Get Form Values').first().json.email }}
Enquiry: {{ $('Get Form Values').first().json.enquiry }}
Submitted at: {{ $('Get Form Values').first().json.submittedAt }}
parameters.subject: =Appointment Request Received for {{ DateTime.fromISO($('Get Form Values').first().json.dateTime).format('EEE, dd MMM @ t') }}

parameters.message:
=

A new appointment request was submitted!

Requesting appointment date is {{ DateTime.fromISO($('Execute Workflow Trigger').item.json.dateTime).format('EEE, dd MMM @ t') }}.

Name: {{ $('Execute Workflow Trigger').first().json.name }}
Email: {{ $('Execute Workflow Trigger').first().json.email }}
Enquiry Summary: {{ $json.text }}
Submitted at: {{ $('Execute Workflow Trigger').first().json.submittedAt }}
parameters.subject: New Appointment Request!

parameters.message:
=

Dear {{ $('Execute Workflow Trigger').first().json.name }},

Unfortunately, we cannot schedule the requested appointment at the requested time.

Kind regards
parameters.subject: =Appointment Request Rejected for {{ DateTime.fromISO($('Execute Workflow Trigger').first().json.dateTime).format('EEE, dd MMM @ t') }}
